body: That feel when you can't read Chinese

Google translate is the best real time translating app for the illiterate. But you'd need two devices I suppose.

I just use it to change the settings on jap games. Like EDF 5 before it came to america. But can be used for untranslated manga.
@Red753 actually some of these characters are rather thick considering most of dhibi's art but it is still hot as hell
I love this, and I love Dhibi's hetero stories but i don't know how to read in chinese. It isn't in english or spanish? Pleeeeeeeeeeaaaseeeeee
The characters are impossibly thin and lanky. It makes me suspect Dhibi is a woman who grew up reading shoujo manga.
I don't really know why but Dhibi's drawings freak me out, probably the way he draws the human bodies
I just might need to make a shrine for Dhibi. He/she is obviously a god.
